shri lanka kandayame anka 3 saha 4 yana sthana wala krida kirima sandaha kusal mendis saha nayaka dinesh chandimal sthawara wi sitina athara aabadhayakata lakwa sitina anjalo mathiwsge sthanaye (anka 5) krida kirima sandaha chamara kapugedarata wadi idak thibe.
desa 6:35 pawa, gampaha, barawahana ru. 516,000
akuru hakiyawa, rakiya niyukthiya wagema, chande dana prathishathayath in ekak.
shri lanka kandayama anjalo mathiwsge nayakathwaya yatathe mema awasan shurayange kusalana tharagawaliyata sahabhagi weyi.
boho muslim prathisanskaranawadin kele, batahira lokaya thakshanika drudangawala gabadawak washayen ganimayi.
ohu ayata thambaili wathura koppayak bonnata dunne ya.
adi kipayak palala wiwrutha aalindayak sada niwase diga wadi karana lesa upades dunimi.
awasana yuda samaye manawa ayithiwasikam kadawim siduwu bawata koti dayasporawa genagiya pracharanayan nisa mema awasi sahagatha thathwaya lankawata erehiwa mathu wiya.

eeta pera me siddhiyata adala guruwariyage kriyakalapaya gana wishesha yamak kiwayuthuyi.
jathiyak winasha karanna puluwan aanduwak thamayi me inne.
